>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/v1/public/cg/contracts"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



获取合约信息

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"client-ip","in":"header","description":"client-ip","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"OK","content":{"*/*":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"title":"ContractVO","type":"object","properties":{"ask":{"type":"string","description":"Current lowest ask price"},"base_currency":{"type":"string","description":"Symbol/currency code of base pair, eg. BTC"},"base_volume":{"type":"string","description":"24小时交易量"},"bid":{"type":"string","description":"Current highest bid price"},"collection_internal":{"type":"integer","description":"收取时间间隔（小时）","format":"int32"},"contractSize":{"type":"number","format":"bigdecimal"},"end_timestamp":{"type":"integer","description":"Ending of this derivative product (relevant for expirable futures or options)","format":"int64"},"funding_rate":{"type":"number","description":"资金费率","format":"bigdecimal"},"high":{"type":"string","description":"24小时最高交易价格"},"id":{"type":"integer","format":"int64"},"index_currency":{"type":"string","description":"Underlying currency for index"},"index_name":{"type":"string","description":"Name of the underlying index if any"},"index_price":{"type":"string","description":"Underlying index price"},"last_price":{"type":"string","description":"最新价格"},"low":{"type":"string","description":"24小时最低交易价格"},"next_funding_rate":{"type":"number","description":"Upcoming predicted funding rate","format":"bigdecimal"},"next_funding_rate_timestamp":{"type":"integer","description":"下次资金费率时间","format":"int64"},"open_interest":{"type":"number","description":"The open interest in the last 24 hours in contracts","format":"bigdecimal"},"product_type":{"type":"string","description":"产品类型"},"start_timestamp":{"type":"integer","description":"Starting of this derivative product (relevant for expirable futures or options)","format":"int64"},"symbol":{"type":"string"},"target_currency":{"type":"string","description":"Symbol/currency code of target pair, eg. ETH"},"target_volume":{"type":"string","description":"24小时交易额"},"ticker_id":{"type":"string","description":"Identifier of a ticker with delimiter to separate base/target, eg. BTC-PERP"},"underlyingType":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"}}}}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"},"403":{"description":"Forbidden"},"404":{"description":"Not Found"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
